channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- VIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- VIOS

item.title: CVE-2021-29693|2024-09-17T03:55:05.247Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a local user that is in the with elevated group privileges to cause a denial of service due to a vulnerability in the lpd daemon. IBM X-Force ID: 200255.

item.title: CVE-2021-38989|2024-09-17T02:41:58.321Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX kernel to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 212951.

item.title: CVE-2021-29860|2024-09-17T02:51:31.350Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the libc.a library to expose sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 206084.

item.title: CVE-2021-38988|2024-09-17T02:02:34.798Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX kernel to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 212950.

item.title: CVE-2021-38996|2024-09-17T00:56:49.906Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX kernel to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 213076.

item.title: CVE-2021-29801|2024-09-17T01:11:01.851Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the kernel to gain root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 203977.

item.title: CVE-2021-38993|2024-09-17T02:06:22.867Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the smbcd daemon to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 212962.
